synopsis.text: Because focusing in class is a challenge when your neighbor is a master of distraction, Rumi Yokoi finds herself reluctantly captivated by the elaborate and imaginative setups created by her classmate Toshinari Seki. From intricate domino courses to intense battles fought with shogi pieces, Seki's creative antics never fail to lure Yokoi away from her schoolwork. Despite her best efforts to remain diligent, Yokoi constantly finds herself entangled in Seki's world of desk-bound entertainment. As she struggles to maintain her focus, Yokoi can't help but admire the sheer ingenuity of her neighbor's creations, even as they consistently land her in hot water with their teacher. Join Yokoi as she navigates the trials and tribulations of trying to learn while seated next to the ultimate classroom distraction in this delightful and engaging anime.
